WorkItem.Description:
I'm strangely having problems using rawr now ( i used it times ago with no problems).
Basically now i can't even start the program since when i formatted my pc.
Every time i try to start rawr i get an error that says:
"Rawr.exe - Application Error"
"Application not correctly initialized (0xc0000135). Press ok to close the application"
Â 
Basically i'm thinking i lack libraries of some sorts that rawr need to work but i can't find what i need, is rawr developed in some particular system or those it need some framework/dll's installed? ( that i probably had before formatting for some reasons i don't know)

Comments.Message: Yes, you need to install MS Net in order to use Rawr.
